summary: Provides comprehensive unit and integration tests for the Stable Cascade decoder pipeline, verifying its core functionalities such as attention slicing, halfâ€‘precision inference, batch processing, prompt and image embedding handling, guidance mechanisms, and correct interaction with the Wuerstchen decoder using lightweight dummy components.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability, performance, and correctness of the Stable Cascade image generation pipeline for production use, enabling early detection of regressions and ensuring consistent behavior across different hardware configurations.
